sys_atf_test.description:
Test the navigation module for all user roles.
-- Create Users -- 1. Set up standard test records
-- Test User without roles -- 2. Impersonate User without Role 3. Verify Time Tracking Application Menu is not visible. 4. Verify All Time Tracking modules are not visible
-- Test user With User Role -- 5. Impersonate TimeSheet Test (User Role) 6. Confirm Time Tracking application is visible 7. Confirm Proper Modules are visible:
-- Test user with Approver role -- 8. Impersonate TimeSheet Manager user 9. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 10. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test user with Approver and User roles -- 11. Add User role to manager user 12. Impersonate initiating Admin 13. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 14. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test user with Finance Role -- 15. Impersonate TimeSheet Finance user 16. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 17. Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.
-- Test Admin Role -- 34. Impersonate TimeSheet Admin User 35. Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible 36. Confirm All Modules are visible.
sys_atf_test.name: Time - Validate Nav Module

sys_update_version.name: sys_atf_test_465bacf3db4a2300482906e2ca961983

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_test"><sys_atf_test action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from/><description>Test the navigation module for all user roles.

-- Create Users --
1.	Set up standard test records 

-- Test User without roles --
2.	Impersonate User without Role
3.	Verify Time Tracking Application Menu is not visible.
4.	Verify All Time Tracking modules are not visible

-- Test user With User Role --
5.	Impersonate TimeSheet Test (User Role)
6.	Confirm Time Tracking application is visible
7.	Confirm Proper Modules are visible: 

-- Test user with Approver role -- 
8.	Impersonate TimeSheet Manager user
9.	Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible
10.	Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.

-- Test user with Approver and User roles --
11.	Add User role to manager user
12.	Impersonate initiating Admin
13.	Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible
14.	Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.

-- Test user with Finance Role --
15.	Impersonate TimeSheet Finance user
16.	Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible
17.	Confirm Appropriate Modules are visible.

-- Test Admin Role -- 
34.	Impersonate TimeSheet Admin User
35.	Confirm Time Tracking Application is visible
36.	Confirm All Modules are visible.</description><enable_parameterized_testing>false</enable_parameterized_testing><name>Time - Validate Nav Module</name><parameters/><remember/><sys_class_name>sys_atf_test</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>_ejense</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-12-04 23:28:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>465bacf3db4a2300482906e2ca961983</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Time - Validate Nav Module</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Time Tracking" source="x_dehp_time_track">fd7546c9db82eb00aa0f71043996190b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Time Tracking">fd7546c9db82eb00aa0f71043996190b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_test_465bacf3db4a2300482906e2ca961983</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>_ejense</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-09 21:12:50</sys_updated_on></sys_atf_test></record_update>
